title: Functionalized Molybdenum Disulfide (MoS2) Monolayer as Efficient Nanosensor Towards Toxic Nitrogen Containing Gases
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00072B, Paper
Wadha Alfalasi, Tanveer Hussain, Nacir Tit
Gas-sensing properties of toxic nitrogen-containing gases (e.g., NO and NO2) on selected transition metals (TMs) functionalized molybdenum disulfide (MoS2) monolayer were investigated using a combination of density-functional theory (DFT) and...
